Package com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation

Class ProductCategoryDaoMem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation.ProductCategoryDaoMem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProductCategoryDao

    public class ProductCategoryDaoMem
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProductCategoryDao
    This is a simple product category data access object which helps the ProductCategory class to save and load data from the memory.

    It implements the ProductCategoryDao interface. It has 4 methods, one, that adds a ProductCategory to the memory, one, that removes it if necessary, one, that returns all categories in a list and one for searching for a category in the memory.

    Since:
    2018-01-17

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ProductCategoryDaoMem getInstance​()
        This method checks if an instance does not already exist. If not, a new instance of the class is created and assigned to the instance variable. If an existing instance is available, then the getInstance method returns this. The result is that the returned value is always the same instance, and no new resource or overhead is required.
        Returns:
        a single instance of the class

      • add

        public void add​(ProductCategory category)
         throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method adds a ProductCategory to an ArrayList, which represents the memory. It has one parameter, which is a ProductCategory that gets inserted into the list. If the argument is null it throws an IllegalArgumentException.
        Specified by:
        add in interface ProductCategoryDao
        Parameters:
        category - this is the ProductCategory that gets added to the memory
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter category equals to null

      • find

        public ProductCategory find​(int id)
        This method searches for the ProductCategory in the memory based on the id of the category. If it does not find the ProductCategory, it returns null. However if the ProductCategory is found based on the id than it gets returned.
        Specified by:
        find in interface ProductCategoryDao
        Parameters:
        id - the ProductCategory will be searched for based on this id
        Returns:
        the ProductCategory, which has the corresponding id

      • remove

        public void remove​(int id)
        This method finds and removes the ProductCategory based on the id given as parameter.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface ProductCategoryDao
        Parameters:
        id - the ProductCategory will be removed based on this id

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<ProductCategory> getAll​()
        This method gets all the product categories from the memory and returns them in an ArrayList.
        Specified by:
        getAll in interface ProductCategoryDao
        Returns:
        an ArrayList, which contains all the product categories
